The fact is you can never trust the recording whether it is an EVP or Fran=
k's Box or a picture of a UFO. =C2=A0You can only trust or not trust the so=
urce.
Days after the first photo, people were doctoring them. =C2=A0Same wi=
th audio.
That is why I'm more interested in things I gather myself and I r=
eally don't care if anyone else hears the same thing or believes me that I =
did not modify it.
I do it for my own purposes, not to convince others.
Don=

Everyone has their own ass=
umptions, expectations, and subjectivity.=C2=A0 Scientists realize this, an=

n predispositions.

On your advice, I read more of her articles.=C2=A0 The =
one on EVPS: (http://www.haunteda mericatours. com/EVP/EVP/) does show her =
presumptions, and she=C2=A0 presents many of the issues and potentials for =
"false positives" that I assume all experienced EVP researchers already kno=
w of. =C2=A0 But she also comments to the claims: "My response to this is=
=E2=80=A6provide the evidence! "


So that would seem to me she would be op=
en to a well-designed test to "show her the evidence".=C2=A0 So I will cont=
act her, suggest this sort of test, and even suggest that experts from this=
 group would help to design and conduct the test - maybe even Frank - and l=
et you know what she says.
